content:

thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to first craft light_gray_dye. One way to do so is to combine 1 black dye and 2 white dye. Therefore, I will move the black dye from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
